author: tellison
msg: Remove multicast socket native call, and replace it with regular datagram socket creation.

The main difference here is that the setting of SO_REUSEADDR will be called for sockets created from a user defined datagram socket factory (it wasn't previously).  Since we need the option set, this is a good thing.

author: jvanzyl
msg: o using annotations for DefaultMaven, remove hand-made entry

author: jvanzyl
msg: o javadoc for the extension listener

author: jochen
msg: Weakened the access control in the WebServer class in order to make subclassing easier.

author: bentmann
msg: o Deleted it0088 for MNG-1927 which is superseded by more complete IT for MNG-3475
